column1: frahlg%%First application for TA in. Is there anyone that wants to be part of the requirement team?%%2022-03-25 18:53:59
frahlg%%``` Sign up for an assistant in the IoT summer course 2022

You are getting this mail because you attended one of our previous summer courses in Applied IoT at Linnaeus University. I do hope that you thought it was worth your time and that you have been able to use what you learned. Anyway
column2: this mail has a particular purpose ‚Äì and that is that I am yet again searching for the best and most motivated IoT enthusiasts out there.

column1: Do you like to be a part of the team and lead workshops in the next summer course?
You will get paid from Linnaeus University for your hours
column2: and those can be flexible according to your own preference. Last year some assistants worked a bit more and some less. You will have an opportunity to get paid while doing what you love (if that‚Äôs IoT‚Ä¶). Most important
column3: teaching experience from this course will for sure look good on your CV. And I will also
column5: personally write a recommendation letter on your behalf.

column1: -¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† You need to be an active and registered student at a European University.
-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† You need to have passed the Applied IoT course
column2: preferably A/B grade.

column1: The course starts at 6th of June and ends the 15th of July. Most workshops will take place during late afternoons and evenings
column2: Tuesday ‚Äì Thursday
